label: AB4C6D_mC48_15_e_2f_3f_e-001
title: Gypsum (CaSO$_{4}\cdot$2H$_{2}$O, $H4_{6}$) Structure
comments: (Onorato, 1929) determined that gypsum was in space group $C2/m$ \#13, and (Hermann, 1937) assigned this to {\em Strukturbericht} $H4_{6}$.  However, (Wooster, 1936) and other determined that the correct space group was $C2/c$ \#15, and (Gottfried, 1938) assigned the $H4_{6}$ symbol to this structure.  We use the 1\,atmosphere data of (Comodi, 2008), who also determine the positions of the hydrogen atoms.
